name: Droid Uprising (itch)
description:
In a world where one government reigns supreme, and uses attack robots to defeat all who oppose them, who can stop them other than one of their robots itself? Fight alongside a massive rebellion, battling across many regions to restore this god forsaken planet to its once former glory. Throughout this game you will be battling enemy robots and enemy soldiers in order to achieve this goal.

Our indiedb page will be more up to date than this page, so if anyone wishes to learn more, please head over there.
